entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:41 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: WNW 20 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
